title: The Pattern of progress
brief_description: The dynamic progress and development of Davies Coop, now one of Australia’s largest textile manufacrtuing companies. Scouring, spinning, and e=eaving processes are imaginatively photographed, creating a sreies of rhythmic and artistic patttersn in keeping wiht the tempo of a modern progressive age. Laboratory tests and research tests and research reslut in the creation of new and exiting colorus and textures, continually increasing the production range.
